Plot: The three-year romance between 19th-century poet John Keats and Fanny Brawne near the end of his life.
Title: Bright Star
Writer: Jane Campion, Jane Campion (screenplay), Andrew Motion (biography "Keats")
Actors: Abbie Cornish, Ben Whishaw, Paul Schneider, Kerry Fox
tomatoConsensus: Jane Campion's direction is as refined as her screenplay, and she gets the most out of her cast -- especially Abbie Cornish -- in this understated period drama.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 15 wins & 48 nominations.
